text: riddle it is one of my favorite things
to give for the holidays and it's super

one of the reasons brenell is so great
is that it only takes seven ingredients
most of which you probably already have

going to add is water and that is
because if you add sugar first you run
the risk of it burning on the bottom of

we're using is light you don't want to
use the dark stuff that has too much of

give it a good stir you don't want to
make sure that everything is dissolved
that's really all you're going for
you're gonna want to grab your candy

our sugar is at 230 degrees I'm going to

I'm also gonna add the curry powder now
so you're adding your salt and you

dissolve completely by the time your
brittle stuff you want to start pretty
constantly right now because otherwise

you'll notice that the nuts begin to

you smell burnt sugar it's all really

even so when it comes time to spread it

Silpat totally necessary for this
